price: 1. Tâ, Sîn. Ce sont là les versets du Coran, (versets) d’un Livre explicite,
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
